channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: The show comes from Milestones Museum in Basingstoke, which recreates the streets of Hampshire past. Elizabeth Talbot and James Lewis are the experts doing the honours as they find the best antiques and collectibles to take to auction. Meanwhile, Paul Martin meets a modern sculptor who takes nature as his inspiration, carving everything from scorpions to giant spiders.
